trans-unit.source: Provides static methods for creating, extracting, and opening zip archives.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于创建、 解压缩和打开 zip 存档的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > To use the ZipFile class, you must add a reference to the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project; otherwise, you'll get the following error message when trying to compile : **The name 'ZipFile' does not exist in the current context**.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]1> 到使用 ZipFile 类，必须添加对的引用`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`项目; 中的程序集否则，你将得到以下错误消息，当尝试编译︰ **ZipFile 不存在当前上下文中的名称**。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to add a reference to your project in Visual Studio, see [How to: Add or Remove References By Using the Reference Manager](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中添加到你的项目的引用的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 添加或删除引用使用引用管理器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The methods for manipulating zip archives and their files are spread across three classes: ZipFile, <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive> and <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry>.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作的 zip 存档和其文件的方法将分布在三个类︰ zip 文件，<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive>和<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry>。</xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive>

trans-unit.source: |To…|Use…| |---------|----------| |Create a zip archive from a directory|<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |Extract the contents of a zip archive to a directory|<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |Add new files to an existing zip archive|<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive.CreateEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |Retrieve an file in a zip archive|<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive.GetEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |Retrieve all of the files in a zip archive|<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive.Entries%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |To open a stream to an individual file contained in a zip archive|<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |Delete a file from a zip archive|<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry.Delete%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| You cannot use the ZipFile or <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFileExtensions> classes in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps.
trans-unit.target: |到...|...使用 | |---------|----------| |从目录中创建的 zip 存档 |<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |提取到目录的 zip 存档的内容 |<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |将新文件添加到现有的 zip 存档 |<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive.CreateEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |检索 zip 存档中的文件 |<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive.GetEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |检索 zip 存档中的文件的所有 |<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive.Entries%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |若要打开 zip 存档中包含单个文件的流 |<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |从 zip 存档中删除文件 |<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry.Delete%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| 不能使用 ZipFile 或<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFileExtensions>中的类[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。</xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFileExtensions> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry.Delete%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive.Entries%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive.GetEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive.CreateEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you should use the following classes to work with compressed files.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用，你应使用以下类处理的压缩文件。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive> - <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry> - <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> - <xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream>
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive> - <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry> - <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> - <xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream></xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream></xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream></xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry></xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive>

trans-unit.source: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 创建包含的文件和目录的指定目录的 zip 存档。

trans-unit.source: The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive.
trans-unit.target: 从文件系统的目录结构将保留在存档中。

trans-unit.source: If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果此目录为空，则创建空存档。

trans-unit.source: This method overload does not include the base directory in the archive and does not allow you to specify a compression level.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载不存档中包括的基目录，并且不允许你指定的压缩级别。

trans-unit.source: If you want to include the base directory or specify a compression level, call the <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要包括的基目录，或指定压缩级别，请调用<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载。</xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: If the archive already exists, an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档已存在，<xref:System.IO.IOException>引发异常。</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name.
trans-unit.target: 如果在存档中已存在一个具有指定名称的项，第二个条目被创建具有相同的名称。

trans-unit.source: If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法将目录中的文件添加到存档，存档左不完整和无效，并且该方法将引发<xref:System.IO.IOException>异常。</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 要存档，指定为相对或绝对路径的目录路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 存档创建，指定为相对或绝对路径的路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryName或destinationArchiveFileName是，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName is .
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryNameor destinationArchiveFileName is .

trans-unit.source: In sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName, the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 在 sourceDirectoryName 或 destinationArchiveFileName ，指定的路径和 / 或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，和文件名称不能超过 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryName无效或不存在 （例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: destinationArchiveFileName already exists.
trans-unit.target: destinationArchiveFileName已存在。

trans-unit.source: -or- A file in the specified directory could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: -或者-无法打开指定的目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: destinationArchiveFileName specifies a directory.
trans-unit.target: destinationArchiveFileName指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission to access the directory specified in sourceDirectoryName or the file specified in destinationArchiveFileName.
trans-unit.target: -或-调用方没有所要求的权限访问中指定的目录sourceDirectoryName中指定的文件或destinationArchiveFileName。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName contains an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryName或destinationArchiveFileName包含无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- The zip archive does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: -或者-zip 存档不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level, and optionally includes the base directory.
trans-unit.target: 创建 zip 存档，其中包含的文件和目录指定的目录，使用指定的压缩级别，可以选择包含基目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive.
trans-unit.target: 从文件系统的目录结构将保留在存档中。

trans-unit.source: If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果此目录为空，则创建空存档。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload to specify the compression level and whether to include the base directory in the archive.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法重载来指定压缩级别以及是否要包含在存档中的基目录。

trans-unit.source: If the archive already exists, an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档已存在，<xref:System.IO.IOException>引发异常。</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name.
trans-unit.target: 如果在存档中已存在一个具有指定名称的项，第二个条目被创建具有相同的名称。

trans-unit.source: If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法将目录中的文件添加到存档，存档左不完整和无效，并且该方法将引发<xref:System.IO.IOException>异常。</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 要存档，指定为相对或绝对路径的目录路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 存档创建，指定为相对或绝对路径的路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否要创建项时强调速度或压缩有效性的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the directory name from `sourceDirectoryName` at the root of the archive; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to include only the contents of the directory.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括的目录名称`sourceDirectoryName`根目录下的存档;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>包括仅目录的内容。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryName或destinationArchiveFileName是，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName is .
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryNameor destinationArchiveFileName is .

trans-unit.source: In sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName, the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 在 sourceDirectoryName 或 destinationArchiveFileName ，指定的路径和 / 或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，和文件名称不能超过 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryName无效或不存在 （例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: destinationArchiveFileName already exists.
trans-unit.target: destinationArchiveFileName已存在。

trans-unit.source: -or- A file in the specified directory could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: -或者-无法打开指定的目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: destinationArchiveFileName specifies a directory.
trans-unit.target: destinationArchiveFileName指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission to access the directory specified in sourceDirectoryName or the file specified in destinationArchiveFileName.
trans-unit.target: -或-调用方没有所要求的权限访问中指定的目录sourceDirectoryName中指定的文件或destinationArchiveFileName。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName contains an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryName或destinationArchiveFileName包含无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- The zip archive does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: -或者-zip 存档不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level and character encoding for entry names, and optionally includes the base directory.
trans-unit.target: 创建 zip 存档，其中包含的文件和目录指定的目录，使用指定的压缩级别和字符编码进行条目名称，可以选择包含基目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive.
trans-unit.target: 从文件系统的目录结构将保留在存档中。

trans-unit.source: If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果此目录为空，则创建空存档。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload to specify the compression level and character encoding, and whether to include the base directory in the archive.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法重载来指定压缩级别和字符编码，以及是否要包含在存档中的基目录。

trans-unit.source: If the archive already exists, an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档已存在，<xref:System.IO.IOException>引发异常。</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name.
trans-unit.target: 如果在存档中已存在一个具有指定名称的项，第二个条目被创建具有相同的名称。

trans-unit.source: If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法将目录中的文件添加到存档，存档左不完整和无效，并且该方法将引发<xref:System.IO.IOException>异常。</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: If `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the entry names are encoded by using the specified encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，通过使用指定的编码进行编码条目名称。

trans-unit.source: If the specified encoding is a UTF-8, the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set for each entry, If `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, the entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and UTF-8 is used to encode the entry name.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的编码为 utf-8，编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言设置为每个项，如果`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称是根据以下规则进行编码:-条目包含外的 ASCII 字符的名称范围，设置编码的标志，语言和 utf-8 用于编码的条目名称。

trans-unit.source: - For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is set, and the current system default code page is used to encode the entry names.
trans-unit.target: -对于仅包含 ASCII 字符的条目名称，设置语言编码标志，和当前的系统默认代码页用于编码条目名称。

trans-unit.source: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 要存档，指定为相对或绝对路径的目录路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 存档创建，指定为相对或绝对路径的路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否要创建项时强调速度或压缩有效性的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the directory name from `sourceDirectoryName` at the root of the archive; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to include only the contents of the directory.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括的目录名称`sourceDirectoryName`根目录下的存档;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>包括仅目录的内容。

trans-unit.source: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.
trans-unit.target: 读取时要使用的编码，或在该存档文件中写入条目名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.
trans-unit.target: 仅当需要与 zip 存档工具和不支持 utf-8 编码项名称的库的互操作性的编码时，请指定此参数的值。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryName或destinationArchiveFileName是，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: -or- entryNameEncoding is set to a Unicode encoding other than UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: -或-entryNameEncoding设置为 Unicode 编码不是 utf-8。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName is .
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryNameor destinationArchiveFileName is .

trans-unit.source: In sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName, the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 在 sourceDirectoryName 或 destinationArchiveFileName ，指定的路径和 / 或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，和文件名称不能超过 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryName无效或不存在 （例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: destinationArchiveFileName already exists.
trans-unit.target: destinationArchiveFileName已存在。

trans-unit.source: -or- A file in the specified directory could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: -或者-无法打开指定的目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: destinationArchiveFileName specifies a directory.
trans-unit.target: destinationArchiveFileName指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission to access the directory specified in sourceDirectoryName or the file specified in destinationArchiveFileName.
trans-unit.target: -或-调用方没有所要求的权限访问中指定的目录sourceDirectoryName中指定的文件或destinationArchiveFileName。

trans-unit.source: sourceDirectoryName or destinationArchiveFileName contains an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: sourceDirectoryName或destinationArchiveFileName包含无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- The zip archive does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: -或者-zip 存档不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system.
trans-unit.target: 所有文件都解压缩到的目录将指定的 zip 存档中的文件系统上。

trans-unit.source: This method creates the specified directory and all subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建指定的目录及其所有子目录。

trans-unit.source: The destination directory cannot already exist.
trans-unit.target: 目标目录不能已存在。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions related to validating the paths in the `destinationDirectoryName` or `sourceArchiveFileName` parameters are thrown before extraction.
trans-unit.target: 验证中的路径与异常`destinationDirectoryName`或`sourceArchiveFileName`参数引发之前提取。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果提取过程中发生错误，保持部分提取存档。

trans-unit.source: Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive.
trans-unit.target: 每个提取的文件具有指定的目录的同一相对路径`destinationDirectoryName`作为其源项均具有到存档的根。

trans-unit.source: The path to the archive that is to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: 要解压缩存档的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中放置所提取的文件，指定为相对或绝对路径的目录路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: destinationDirectoryName or sourceArchiveFileName is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
trans-unit.target: destinationDirectoryName或sourceArchiveFileName是，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: destinationDirectoryName or sourceArchiveFileName is .
trans-unit.target: destinationDirectoryNameor sourceArchiveFileName is .

trans-unit.source: The specified path in destinationDirectoryName or sourceArchiveFileName exceeds the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 中的指定的路径 destinationDirectoryName 或 sourceArchiveFileName 超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，和文件名称不能超过 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径无效 （例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: The directory specified by destinationDirectoryName already exists.
trans-unit.target: 指定的目录 destinationDirectoryName 已存在。

trans-unit.source: -or- The name of an entry in the archive is <xref:System.String>, contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
trans-unit.target: -或-存档中的条目的名称是<xref:System.String>，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: -or- Extracting an archive entry would create a file that is outside the directory specified by destinationDirectoryName.
trans-unit.target: -或-提取存档条目会创建超出指定的目录的文件 destinationDirectoryName 。

trans-unit.source: (For example, this might happen if the entry name contains parent directory accessors.) -or- An archive entry to extract has the same name as an entry that has already been extracted from the same archive.
trans-unit.target: （例如，这可能会发生如果条目名中包含父目录访问器。） -或者-要提取的存档项具有相同的名称为已经从同一存档提取的项。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission to access the archive or the destination directory.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限访问存档或目标目录。

trans-unit.source: destinationDirectoryName or sourceArchiveFileName contains an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: destinationDirectoryName或sourceArchiveFileName包含无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: sourceArchiveFileName was not found.
trans-unit.target: sourceArchiveFileName未找到。

trans-unit.source: The archive specified by sourceArchiveFileName is not a valid zip archive.
trans-unit.target: 指定存档 sourceArchiveFileName 不是有效的 zip 存档。

trans-unit.source: -or- An archive entry was not found or was corrupt.
trans-unit.target: -或者-存档条目找不到或已损坏。

trans-unit.source: -or- An archive entry was compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.
trans-unit.target: -或者-存档条目已使用不支持的压缩方法进行压缩。

trans-unit.source: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system and uses the specified character encoding for entry names.
trans-unit.target: 所有文件都解压缩到的目录将指定的 zip 存档中的文件系统上，并使用指定的字符编码条目名称。

trans-unit.source: This method creates the specified directory and all subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建指定的目录及其所有子目录。

trans-unit.source: The destination directory cannot already exist.
trans-unit.target: 目标目录不能已存在。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions related to validating the paths in the `destinationDirectoryName` or `sourceArchiveFileName` parameters are thrown before extraction.
trans-unit.target: 验证中的路径与异常`destinationDirectoryName`或`sourceArchiveFileName`参数引发之前提取。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果提取过程中发生错误，保持部分提取存档。

trans-unit.source: Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive.
trans-unit.target: 每个提取的文件具有指定的目录的同一相对路径`destinationDirectoryName`作为其源项均具有到存档的根。

trans-unit.source: If `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - For entry names where the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the entry names are decoded by using the specified encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则:-其中编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言不设置，通过使用指定的编码解码的名称的项的项名称。

trans-unit.source: - For entries where the language encoding flag is set, the entry names are decoded by using UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: -对于其中设置语言编码标志的条目，通过使用 utf-8 解码条目名称。

trans-unit.source: If `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - For entries where the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, entry names are decoded by using the current system default code page.
trans-unit.target: 如果`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则:-其中编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言不设置，名称进行解码通过使用当前的系统默认代码页的条目的条目。

trans-unit.source: - For entries where the language encoding flag is set, the entry names are decoded by using UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: -对于其中设置语言编码标志的条目，通过使用 utf-8 解码条目名称。

trans-unit.source: The path to the archive that is to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: 要解压缩存档的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中放置所提取的文件，指定为相对或绝对路径的目录路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.
trans-unit.target: 读取时要使用的编码，或在该存档文件中写入条目名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.
trans-unit.target: 仅当需要与 zip 存档工具和不支持 utf-8 编码项名称的库的互操作性的编码时，请指定此参数的值。

trans-unit.source: destinationDirectoryName or sourceArchiveFileName is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
trans-unit.target: destinationDirectoryName或sourceArchiveFileName是，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: -or- entryNameEncoding is set to a Unicode encoding other than UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: -或-entryNameEncoding设置为 Unicode 编码不是 utf-8。

trans-unit.source: destinationDirectoryName or sourceArchiveFileName is .
trans-unit.target: destinationDirectoryNameor sourceArchiveFileName is .

trans-unit.source: The specified path in destinationDirectoryName or sourceArchiveFileName exceeds the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 中的指定的路径 destinationDirectoryName 或 sourceArchiveFileName 超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，和文件名称不能超过 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径无效 （例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: The directory specified by destinationDirectoryName already exists.
trans-unit.target: 指定的目录 destinationDirectoryName 已存在。

trans-unit.source: -or- The name of an entry in the archive is <xref:System.String>, contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
trans-unit.target: -或-存档中的条目的名称是<xref:System.String>，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: -or- Extracting an archive entry would create a file that is outside the directory specified by destinationDirectoryName.
trans-unit.target: -或-提取存档条目会创建超出指定的目录的文件 destinationDirectoryName 。

trans-unit.source: (For example, this might happen if the entry name contains parent directory accessors.) -or- An archive entry to extract has the same name as an entry that has already been extracted from the same archive.
trans-unit.target: （例如，这可能会发生如果条目名中包含父目录访问器。） -或者-要提取的存档项具有相同的名称为已经从同一存档提取的项。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission to access the archive or the destination directory.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限访问存档或目标目录。

trans-unit.source: destinationDirectoryName or sourceArchiveFileName contains an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: destinationDirectoryName或sourceArchiveFileName包含无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: sourceArchiveFileName was not found.
trans-unit.target: sourceArchiveFileName未找到。

trans-unit.source: The archive specified by sourceArchiveFileName is not a valid zip archive.
trans-unit.target: 指定存档 sourceArchiveFileName 不是有效的 zip 存档。

trans-unit.source: -or- An archive entry was not found or was corrupt.
trans-unit.target: -或者-存档条目找不到或已损坏。

trans-unit.source: -or- An archive entry was compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.
trans-unit.target: -或者-存档条目已使用不支持的压缩方法进行压缩。

trans-unit.source: Opens a zip archive at the specified path and in the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 打开在指定的路径和指定的模式的 zip 存档。

trans-unit.source: When you set the `mode` parameter to <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>, the archive is opened with <xref:System.IO.FileMode> from the <xref:System.IO.FileMode> enumeration as the file mode value.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置`mode`参数<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>，使用打开存档<xref:System.IO.FileMode>从<xref:System.IO.FileMode>枚举为的文件模式值。</xref:System.IO.FileMode> </xref:System.IO.FileMode> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: If the archive does not exist, a <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档不存在，<xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>引发异常。</xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>

trans-unit.source: Setting the `mode` parameter to <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode> is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.OpenRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置`mode`参数<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>等效于调用<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.OpenRead%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.OpenRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: When you set the `mode` parameter to <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>, the archive is opened with <xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> as the file mode value.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置`mode`参数<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>，使用打开存档<xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName>作为文件模式值。</xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: If the archive already exists, an <xref:System.IO.IOException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档已存在，<xref:System.IO.IOException>引发。</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: When you set the `mode` parameter to <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>, the archive is opened with <xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> as the file mode value.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置`mode`参数<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>，使用打开存档<xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName>作为文件模式值。</xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: If the archive exists, it is opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在存档，它打开。

trans-unit.source: The existing entries can be modified and new entries can be created.
trans-unit.target: 可以修改现有条目，并可以创建新项。

trans-unit.source: If the archive does not exist, a new archive is created; however, creating a zip archive in <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode> mode is not as efficient as creating it in <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode> mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档不存在，则创建新存档;但是，创建在 zip 存档<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>模式不是创建在尽可能高效<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>模式。</xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 若要打开，存档的路径指定为相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the actions which are allowed on the entries in the opened archive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的操作的允许打开的存档中的项的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The opened zip archive.
trans-unit.target: 打开的 zip 存档中。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName是，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName is .
trans-unit.target: archiveFileNameis .

trans-unit.source: In archiveFileName, the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 在 archiveFileName ，指定的路径和 / 或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，和文件名称不能超过 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName无效或不存在 （例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName无法打开。

trans-unit.source: -or- mode is set to , but the file specified in archiveFileName already exists.
trans-unit.target: -mode设置为 ，但中指定的文件archiveFileName已存在。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName specifies a directory.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission to access the file specified in archiveFileName.
trans-unit.target: -或-调用方没有所要求的权限访问该文件中指定archiveFileName。

trans-unit.source: mode specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: mode指定了一个无效值。

trans-unit.source: mode is set to , but the file specified in archiveFileName is not found.
trans-unit.target: mode设置为 ，但中指定的文件archiveFileName找不到。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName contains an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName包含无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName could not be interpreted as a zip archive.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName无法解释作为 zip 存档。

trans-unit.source: -or- mode is , but an entry is missing or corrupt and cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: -mode是 ，但一个条目缺失或已损坏，无法读取。

trans-unit.source: -or- mode is , but an entry is too large to fit into memory.
trans-unit.target: -mode是 ，但有一项不太大而无法放入内存。

trans-unit.source: Opens a zip archive at the specified path, in the specified mode, and by using the specified character encoding for entry names.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的模式，以及通过使用指定的字符编码条目名称，请打开指定的路径、 zip 存档。

trans-unit.source: When you set the `mode` parameter to <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>, the archive is opened with <xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> as the file mode value.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置`mode`参数<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>，使用打开存档<xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName>作为文件模式值。</xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: If the archive does not exist, a <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档不存在，<xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>引发异常。</xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>

trans-unit.source: Setting the `mode` parameter to <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode> is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.OpenRead%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置`mode`参数<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>等效于调用<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.OpenRead%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.OpenRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: When you set the `mode` parameter to <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>, the archive is opened with <xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> as the file mode value.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置`mode`参数<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>，使用打开存档<xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName>作为文件模式值。</xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: If the archive already exists, an <xref:System.IO.IOException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档已存在，<xref:System.IO.IOException>引发。</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: When you set the `mode` parameter to <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>, the archive is opened with <xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> as the file mode value.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置`mode`参数<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>，使用打开存档<xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName>作为文件模式值。</xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: If the archive exists, it is opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在存档，它打开。

trans-unit.source: The existing entries can be modified and new entries can be created.
trans-unit.target: 可以修改现有条目，并可以创建新项。

trans-unit.source: If the archive does not exist, a new archive is created; however, creating a zip archive in <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode> mode is not as efficient as creating it in <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode> mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档不存在，则创建新存档;但是，创建在 zip 存档<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>模式不是创建在尽可能高效<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>模式。</xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>

trans-unit.source: When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - When the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the current system default code page is used to decode the entry name.
trans-unit.target: 当打开读取的 zip 存档文件和`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则:-时未设置编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志），该语言当前的系统默认代码页用于解码条目名称。

trans-unit.source: - When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name.
trans-unit.target: -当设置语言编码标志，用于对条目名称解码 utf-8。

trans-unit.source: When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - When the language encoding flag is not set, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to decode the entry name.
trans-unit.target: 当打开读取的 zip 存档文件和`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则:-编码标志的语言未设置时，指定`entryNameEncoding`用于解码条目名称。

trans-unit.source: - When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name.
trans-unit.target: -当设置语言编码标志，用于对条目名称解码 utf-8。

trans-unit.source: When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and entry names are encoded by using UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 当你编写以将文件存档和`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称是根据以下规则进行编码:-条目包含外的 ASCII 字符的名称范围，设置编码的标志，语言和条目名称编码使用 utf-8。

trans-unit.source: - For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is not set, and entry names are encoded by using the current system default code page.
trans-unit.target: -对于仅包含 ASCII 字符的条目名称，未设置语言编码标志，并通过使用当前的系统默认代码页的条目名称进行编码。

trans-unit.source: When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to encode the entry names into bytes.
trans-unit.target: 当你编写以将文件存档和`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，指定`entryNameEncoding`用于转换为字节编码条目名称。

trans-unit.source: The language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set only when the specified encoding is a UTF-8 encoding.
trans-unit.target: 仅当指定的编码为 utf-8 编码时设置编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言。

trans-unit.source: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 若要打开，存档的路径指定为相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the actions that are allowed on the entries in the opened archive.
trans-unit.target: 指定允许的操作打开的存档中的项的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.
trans-unit.target: 读取时要使用的编码，或在该存档文件中写入条目名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.
trans-unit.target: 仅当需要与 zip 存档工具和不支持 utf-8 编码项名称的库的互操作性的编码时，请指定此参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The opened zip archive.
trans-unit.target: 打开的 zip 存档中。

trans-unit.target: archiveFileName是，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: -or- entryNameEncoding is set to a Unicode encoding other than UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: -或-entryNameEncoding设置为 Unicode 编码不是 utf-8。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName is .
trans-unit.target: archiveFileNameis .

trans-unit.source: In archiveFileName, the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 在 archiveFileName ，指定的路径和 / 或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，和文件名称不能超过 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName无效或不存在 （例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.target: archiveFileName无法打开。

trans-unit.source: -or- mode is set to , but the file specified in archiveFileName already exists.
trans-unit.target: -mode设置为 ，但中指定的文件archiveFileName已存在。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName specifies a directory.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission to access the file specified in archiveFileName.
trans-unit.target: -或-调用方没有所要求的权限访问该文件中指定archiveFileName。

trans-unit.source: mode specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: mode指定了一个无效值。

trans-unit.source: mode is set to , but the file specified in archiveFileName is not found.
trans-unit.target: mode设置为 ，但中指定的文件archiveFileName找不到。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName contains an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName包含无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName could not be interpreted as a zip archive.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName无法解释作为 zip 存档。

trans-unit.source: -or- mode is , but an entry is missing or corrupt and cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: -mode是 ，但一个条目缺失或已损坏，无法读取。

trans-unit.source: -or- mode is , but an entry is too large to fit into memory.
trans-unit.target: -mode是 ，但有一项不太大而无法放入内存。

trans-unit.source: Opens a zip archive for reading at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 打开在指定路径用于读取的 zip 存档。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.Open%2A> method and setting the `mode` parameter to <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等效于调用<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.Open%2A>方法和设置`mode`参数到<xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode>。</xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode> </xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipFile.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: The archive is opened with <xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName> as the file mode value.
trans-unit.target: 使用打开存档<xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName>作为文件模式值。</xref:System.IO.FileMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the archive does not exist, a <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果存档不存在，<xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>引发异常。</xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>

trans-unit.source: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 若要打开，存档的路径指定为相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径被指相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: The opened zip archive.
trans-unit.target: 打开的 zip 存档中。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName是，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName is .
trans-unit.target: archiveFileNameis .

trans-unit.source: In archiveFileName, the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 在 archiveFileName ，指定的路径和 / 或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，和文件名称不能超过 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName无效或不存在 （例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName无法打开。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName specifies a directory.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission to access the file specified in archiveFileName.
trans-unit.target: -或-调用方没有所要求的权限访问该文件中指定archiveFileName。

trans-unit.source: The file specified in archiveFileName is not found.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的文件 archiveFileName 找不到。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName contains an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName包含无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: archiveFileName could not be interpreted as a zip archive.
trans-unit.target: archiveFileName无法解释作为 zip 存档。
